title: Our yoga classes
description: We offer a wide range of yoga classes for all levels and needs. Find the perfect class for you!
metaDescription: Explore our wide range of yoga classes including Hatha, Vinyasa, Yin, and more. Classes for all levels in Stenungsund.

hatha.name: Hatha Yoga
hatha.description: A calm and meditative form of yoga focusing on breathing and basic postures. Perfect for beginners.

vinyasa.name: Vinyasa Flow
vinyasa.description: Dynamic yoga where movements flow together with the breath. Builds strength, flexibility and endurance.

yin.name: Yin Yoga
yin.description: Slow and meditative yoga with positions held for 3-5 minutes. Increases flexibility and inner calm.

ashtanga.name: Ashtanga Yoga
ashtanga.description: A powerful and disciplined form of yoga with fixed series of postures. For experienced practitioners.

prenatal.name: Prenatal Yoga
prenatal.description: Adapted yoga for pregnant women. Prepares body and mind for childbirth and parenthood.

restorative.name: Restorative Yoga
restorative.description: Restorative yoga supported by pillows and blankets. Perfect for stress management and deep relaxation.
